title: FS:  T3 Turkey Red, Home Run Baker, SGC 60--NONE HIGHER
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: FS:  T3 Turkey Red, Home Run Baker, SGC 60--NONE HIGHER
posts.post_content:
Tough to top this for a T3 Baker--none higher in SGC pop report and only one higher at PSA...   $1299 delivered.  Identical card (actually mine has better corners) just went for $1500 in the December 2015 Small Traditons auction.  Thanks. 

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=210887&stc=1&d=1446838783[/url]
Very very nice. I wish I had the disposable income.
bump for price cut, gorgeous and tough card
I think it is pretty well known but the T3 image is actually that of teammate Jack Barry, part of the A's million dollar infield and not actually Home Run Baker.  Beautiful card, nevertheless.
